name: Talc-sef
tagline: TALC-sef is a pos-TAgged Literary Corpus, in Serbian, English and French developed at Université d'Artois and Université Lille 3.
body:
# Welcome to TALC-sef
## What is TALC-sef?
TALC-sef stands for pos-TAgged Literary Corpus, in Serbian, English and French.
This page links to the associated github repository, in which you'll find pos-tagging models for Serbian, based on a 100,000 tokens manually revised reference corpus.
Tagging models are available for BTagger, TnT and Treetagger. The best tagger is BTagger, but the optimal speed/accuracy compromise is TnT.
Tagging models are for pos-tagging only: no lemmatization! Tags are based on a tagset aiming at a trade-off between accuracy and grammatical precision. In other words, it stands between the >900 tags from the CesANA corpus (G. Orwell's _1984_ translation into Serbian), used in (Gesmundo and Samardzic, 2012), and Popovic's 16 tags tagsets.

Resources are provided for academic research. 
We've put a lot of effort into this, but, as always, glitches are inevitable here and there. We'll do our best to correct any errors in future versions.

--
A. Balvet
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
